# The `AsynchronousSymbolQuery` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A symbol query that returns results via a callback when results are ready. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::orc::AsynchronousSymbolQuery</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A symbol query that returns results via a callback when results are ready.

makes a callback when all symbols are available.

Definition at line 780 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/core-h">Core.h</a>.

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::orc::AsynchronousSymbolQuery::AsynchronousSymbolQuery (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/symbollookupset">SymbolLookupSet</a> &amp; Symbols, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#adac25fca9fb14b1defe43d18a81c16e8">SymbolState</a> RequiredState, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#af196a28010b167850a05fc95aa763418">SymbolsResolvedCallback</a> NotifyComplete)</>}>
Create a query for the given symbols.

The NotifyComplete callback will be called once all queried symbols reach the given minimum state.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/core-h/#l00791">791</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/core-cpp/#l00202">202</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
